name: European Pari Mutuel Association
membership: Member of the European Horse Network - www.europeanhorsenetwork.eu
goal:
Promote Pari Mutuel betting on horseracing and its business model
Position the Association on future legislation (sports, gaming, online commerce, anti-money laundering)
Recognising the right of sport event organisers to get a fair return
Promoting the sport by preserving integrity
Implementing obligatory responsible gaming rules
Coordination of Member States to control illegal betting activities
Facilitate the exchange of best practices and information between the members (commingling, harmonisation of horse racing rules, publishing statistics...)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Anti-money laundering
Digital Single Market
Copyright
Recommendation on principles for the protection of consumers and players of online gambling services and the prevention of minors from gambling
